title: Scikit Learn Tutorial | Machine Learning with Python | Python for Data Science Training | Edureka
excerpt: Python Certification Training for Data Science : https://www.edureka.co/python-programming-certification-training This Edureka video on "Scikit-learn Tutorial" introduces you to machine learning in Python. It will also takes you through regression and clustering techniques along with a demo on SVM classification
